entry.title: PyTorch Edge: Developer Journey for Deploying AI Models Onto Edge Devices
entry.summary:
Description

This technical session caters to on-device AI engineers, providing insights into developer flows with PyTorch Edge. Through our semi-live demos and code showcases, attendees will embark on a journey to understand the research-to-production workflow using PyTorch Edge. Discover how our APIs and tooling facilitate productivity while ensuring portability across â€¦
entry.content:
Description

This technical session caters to on-device AI engineers, providing insights into developer flows with PyTorch Edge. Through our semi-live demos and code showcases, attendees will embark on a journey to understand the research-to-production workflow using PyTorch Edge. Discover how our APIs and tooling facilitate productivity while ensuring portability across diverse hardware platforms, ranging from mobile phones, embedded devices and laptops.
